title: (VIDEO) ‘Pahanata Thel’ protest confronted by SLPP colleagues
content: Colombo (News 1st); An Ambalangoda Urban Council member representing the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna who was protecting on Monday (05) morning, was confronted by several local politicians from his own camp.The lone politico identified as Gratien Keraminiyage from the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna and also representing a movement called ‘Pahanata Thel’ was protesting against acts of intimidation at the Batapola Town and he was confronted by SLPP members Saman Mawananhewa and Kingsley Weerasiri.The two local government politicians condemned the protests by their colleague.Latest News (VIDEO) Sirisena disappointed over Cardinal’s comments(VIDEO) ‘Pahanata Thel’ protest confronted by SLPP colleaguesCabinet panel appointed to study PCoI report, submits final report to PresidentChinese in SL given Sinopharm jab; 02nd dose for Sri Lankans on 19th AprilImporting Palm Oil suspended with immediate effectShare:
